dynamic_page_hubdb_table_id.description: The ID of the table selected in the 'Advanced Settings` tab of the page editor.

dynamic_page_hubdb_row.description: The HubDB row of the dynamic page that matches with the page request path. If the request is to the listing page, this value will be null.

row.hs_id.description: The internal ID of a HubDB row.

row.hs_name.description: The name of the HubDB row.

row.hs_path.description: The path of the HubDB row. Used to resolve a request to one row in the table specified by dynamic_page_hubdb_table_id.

row.hs_child_table_id.description: The child table ID of the HubDB row. Can be used to build nested templates.

row.hs_parent_row.description: The parent row of the HubDB row. Can only be used when using child tables for nested templates.

dynamic_page_route_level.description: Current depth of a page in a multi-level dynamic template. The value starts at 0 and increments with each additional table layer.
